name: Whitehaven - Prologue
description:
This is the prologue of Whitehaven, a psycological-horror game in first person.

In the prologue you play as Rachel, a girl who lives in the Whitehaven orphanage. You will have to escape from there as you  uncover the mysteries that lurk inside the orphanage.

In the complete game you will be able to explore the entire of the orphanage, solve intrincate puzzles to unlock new areas and learn more about the story of the place.

Wishlist the game on steam!
